sys_ui_page.html:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<script src="x_sofin_cti_connec.pureClientSdkBundleFu.jsdbx"></script>
	<script src="x_sofin_cti_connec.ixnmgrscript.jsdbx"></script>
<html>
<head>
    <style>
        .messages-interactions-view .messages-scroll-pane {
            max-height: 400px;
            overflow-y: auto;
            overflow-x: hidden;
        }

        .messages-interactions-view .messages-message.customer {
            flex-direction: row;
        }

        .messages-interactions-view .messages-message {
            margin: 15px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: flex-start;
        }

        .person-img.person-img-small {
            height: 40px;
            width: 40px;
        }

        .messages-interactions-view .customer .message-body {
            margin-left: 15px;
        }

        .messages-interactions-view .message-body {
            max-width: 70%;
        }

        .messages-interactions-view .customer .message-bubble {
            background-color: #faebd7;
        }

        .messages-interactions-view .message-bubble {
            min-height: 50px;
            border-radius: 6px;
            position: relative;
            padding: 15px;
        }

        .messages-interactions-view .customer .tail {
            border-top: 10px solid transparent;
            border-bottom: 10px solid transparent;
            border-left: 10px solid transparent;
            border-right: 10px solid #faebd7;
            width: 10px;
            position: absolute;
            left: -20px;
            top: 15px;
        }

        .messages-interactions-view .message-text-body {
            overflow-wrap: break-word;
            align-self: center;
        }

        .messages-interactions-view .customer .message-footer {
            align-items: flex-start;
        }

        .messages-interactions-view .message-footer {
            color: #b8b8b8;
            font-size: 12px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
        }

        .messages-interactions-view .messages-message.agent {
            flex-direction: row-reverse;
        }

        .messages-interactions-view .messages-message {
            margin: 15px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: flex-start;
        }

        .messages-interactions-view .agent .message-bubble {
            background-color: #f0f8ff;
        }

        .playback-container .playback-data-waveform {
            position: relative;
            height: 100px;
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
            width: 700px
        }

        .playback-container .playback-played-underlay {
            position: absolute;
            background-color: #56aac6;
            height: 100%;
            z-index: 1;
        }

        .playback-container .playback-total-underlay {
            position: absolute;
            background-color: #b8b8b8;
            width: 90%;
            height: 100%;
            z-index: 0;
        }

        .profile.icon,
        .profile.icon:before {
            position: absolute;
            background-color: currentColor
        }

        .profile.icon.small {
            color: #FFF;
            margin-left: -20px;
            margin-top: 25px;
            width: 42px;
            height: 26px;
            border-left: solid 1px currentColor;
            border-right: solid 1px currentColor;
            border-top: solid 1px currentColor;
            border-bottom: solid 1px transparent;
            border-radius: 6px 6px 0 0;
        }

        .profile.icon.small:before {
            content: '';
            left: 11px;
            top: -25px;
            width: 15px;
            height: 17px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            border: 1px solid currentColor;
        }

        input,
        textarea {
            outline: 0;
            display: block
        }

        a:focus,
        button {
            outline: 0 !important
        }

        .pc-form,
        .phonecall-container {
            -webkit-box-orient: horizontal
        }

        .btn,
        button:hover {
            cursor: pointer
        }

        a,
        a:hover {
            text-decoration: none
        }

        .chat-transcript-view,
        .pc-form {
            -webkit-box-direction: normal;
            -box-direction: normal;
            direction: normal;
        }

        .profile.icon {
            color: #FFF;
            margin-left: -20px;
            margin-top: 65px;
            width: 42px;
            height: 26px;
            border-left: solid 1px currentColor;
            border-right: solid 1px currentColor;
            border-top: solid 1px currentColor;
            border-bottom: solid 1px transparent;
            border-radius: 6px 6px 0 0
        }

        .profile.icon:before {
            content: '';
            left: 8px;
            top: -30px;
            width: 24px;
            height: 24px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            border: 1px solid currentColor
        }

        .h1,
        .h2,
        .h3,
        h1,
        h2,
        h3 {
            margin-top: 22px;
            margin-bottom: 11px
        }

        .h1,
        .h2,
        .h3,
        .h4,
        .h5,
        .h6,
        h1,
        h2,
        h3,
        h4,
        h5,
        h6 {
            font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
            font-weight: 500;
            line-height: 1.1;
            color: inherit
        }

        h3 {
            display: block;
            font-size: 1.17em;
            margin-block-start: 1em;
            margin-block-end: 1em;
            margin-inline-start: 0;
            margin-inline-end: 0;
            font-weight: 700
        }

        .lds-roller {
            display: inline-block;
            position: relative;
            width: 64px;
            height: 64px
        }

        .lds-roller div {
            animation: lds-roller 1.2s cubic-bezier(.5, 0, .5, 1) infinite;
            transform-origin: 32px 32px
        }

        .lds-roller div:after {
            content: " ";
            display: block;
            position: absolute;
            width: 6px;
            height: 6px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: #cef;
            margin: -3px 0 0 -3px
        }

        iframe,
        input {
            border: none !important
        }

        *,
        a,
        h1,
        h2,
        h3,
        h4,
        h5,
        h6,
        li,
        p,
        ul {
            margin: 0
        }

        .lds-roller div:nth-child(1) {
            animation-delay: -36ms
        }

        .lds-roller div:nth-child(1):after {
            top: 50px;
            left: 50px
        }

        .lds-roller div:nth-child(2) {
            animation-delay: -72ms
        }

        .lds-roller div:nth-child(2):after {
            top: 54px;
            left: 45px
        }

        .lds-roller div:nth-child(3) {
            animation-delay: -108ms
        }

        .lds-roller div:nth-child(3):after {
            top: 57px;
            left: 39px
        }

        .lds-roller div:nth-child(4) {
            animation-delay: -144ms
        }

        .lds-roller div:nth-child(4):after {
            top: 58px;
            left: 32px
        }

        .lds-roller div:nth-child(5) {
            animation-delay: -.18s
        }

        .lds-roller div:nth-child(5):after {
            top: 57px;
            left: 25px
        }

        .lds-roller div:nth-child(6) {
            animation-delay: -216ms
        }

        .lds-roller div:nth-child(6):after {
            top: 54px;
            left: 19px
        }

        .lds-roller div:nth-child(7) {
            animation-delay: -252ms
        }

        .lds-roller div:nth-child(7):after {
            top: 50px;
            left: 14px
        }

        .lds-roller div:nth-child(8) {
            animation-delay: -288ms
        }

        .lds-roller div:nth-child(8):after {
            top: 45px;
            left: 10px
        }

        @keyframes lds-roller {
            0% {
                transform: rotate(0)
            }

            100% {
                transform: rotate(360deg)
            }
        }

        * {
            -ms-flex: 0 1 auto;
            flex: 0 1 auto;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box
        }

        body,
        html {
            height: 100%;
            font-family: sans-serif
        }

        a {
            transition: all .4s;
            -webkit-transition: all .4s;
            -o-transition: all .4s;
            -moz-transition: all .4s
        }

        li,
        ul {
            list-style-type: none
        }

        input:focus,
        textarea:focus {
            border-color: transparent !important
        }

        button {
            border: none;
            background: 0 0
        }

        .js-pscroll {
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden
        }

        .table100 .ps__rail-y .ps__thumb-y::before,
        .table100 .ps__rail-y::before {
            content: "";
            display: block;
            position: absolute;
            border-radius: 5px;
            height: calc(100% - 30px);
            top: 15px;
            left: 0
        }

        .table100 .ps__rail-y {
            width: 9px;
            background-color: transparent;
            opacity: 1 !important;
            right: 5px
        }

        .table100 .ps__rail-y::before {
            background-color: #ebebeb;
            width: 100%
        }

        .table100 .ps__rail-y .ps__thumb-y {
            width: 100%;
            right: 0;
            background-color: transparent;
            opacity: 1 !important
        }

        .table100 .ps__rail-y .ps__thumb-y::before {
            background-color: #ccc;
            width: 100%
        }

        .limiter {
            width: 1366px;
            margin: 0 auto
        }

        .container-table100 {
            width: 100%;
            min-height: 100vh;
            background: #fff;
            display: -webkit-box;
            display: -webkit-flex;
            display: -moz-box;
            display: -ms-flexbox;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            padding: 33px 30px
        }

        .wrap-table100 {
            width: 1170px
        }

        table {
            width: 100%
        }

        td,
        th {
            font-weight: unset;
            padding-right: 10px
        }

        .column1 {
            width: 33%;
            padding-left: 40px
        }

        .column2 {
            width: 13%
        }

        .column3 {
            width: 22%
        }

        .column4 {
            width: 19%
        }

        .column5 {
            width: 13%
        }

        .table100-head th {
            padding-top: 18px;
            padding-bottom: 18px
        }

        .table100-body td {
            padding-top: 16px;
            padding-bottom: 16px
        }

        .table100 {
            background-color: #fff;
            position: relative;
            padding-top: 60px
        }

        .table100-head {
            position: absolute;
            width: 100%;
            top: 0;
            left: 0
        }

        .btn,
        .dropdown,
        .dropup {
            position: relative
        }

        .table100-body {
            max-height: 585px;
            overflow: auto
        }

        .table100.ver1 th {
            font-family: Lato-Bold;
            font-size: 18px;
            color: #fff;
            line-height: 1.4;
            background-color: #6c7ae0
        }

        .table100.ver1 td {
            font-family: Lato-Regular;
            font-size: 15px;
            color: grey;
            line-height: 1.4
        }

        .table100.ver1 .table100-body tr:nth-child(even) {
            background-color: #f8f6ff
        }

        .table100.ver1 {
            border-radius: 10px;
            overflow: hidden;
            box-shadow: 0 0 40px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .15);
            -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 40px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .15);
            -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 40px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .15);
            -o-box-shadow: 0 0 40px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .15);
            -ms-box-shadow: 0 0 40px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .15)
        }

        .table100.ver1 .ps__rail-y {
            right: 5px
        }

        .table100.ver1 .ps__rail-y::before {
            background-color: #ebebeb
        }

        .table100.ver1 .ps__rail-y .ps__thumb-y::before {
            background-color: #ccc
        }

        .card {
            box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .2);
            transition: .3s;
            width: 40%
        }

        .card:hover {
            box-shadow: 0 8px 16px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .2)
        }

        .container {
            padding: 2px 16px
        }

        .playback-container {
            flex-direction: column;
            flex-shrink: 0;
            flex-grow: 1;
            overflow: visible;
            padding: 20px
        }

        .phonecall-container {
            display: flex;
            -webkit-box-direction: normal;
            flex-direction: row;
            background-color: #f6f6f6;
            border: 1px solid #b8b8b8;
            border-radius: 6px
        }

        .conversation-participant-container {
            display: flex;
            -webkit-box-direction: normal;
            -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
            flex-direction: column;
            flex-shrink: 0;
            -webkit-box-flex: 0;
            flex-grow: 0
        }

        .playback-container .conversation-participant-container .participant-heading {
            border-bottom: 1px solid #b8b8b8;
            -webkit-box-flex: 0;
            -ms-flex-positive: 0;
            -webkit-flex-grow: 0;
            -moz-flex-grow: 0;
            flex-grow: 0;
            text-align: center;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 0 20px
        }

        .playback-container .conversation-participant-container .participant-body .person-img {
            margin-bottom: 20px
        }

        .playback-container .conversation-participant-container .participant-body {
            display: -webkit-box;
            display: -moz-box;
            display: -ms-flexbox;
            display: -webkit-flex;
            display: flex;
            -ms-flex-positive: 1;
            -webkit-flex-grow: 1;
            -moz-flex-grow: 1;
            flex-grow: 1;
            -webkit-box-flex: 0;
            -ms-flex-negative: 0;
            -webkit-flex-shrink: 0;
            -moz-flex-shrink: 0;
            flex-shrink: 0;
            -webkit-box-direction: normal;
            -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
            -webkit-flex-direction: column;
            -moz-flex-direction: column;
            -ms-flex-direction: column;
            flex-direction: column;
            -ms-flex-align: center;
            -webkit-align-items: center;
            -moz-align-items: center;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 20px;
            width: 200px
        }

        .playback-container .conversation-participant-container .participant-footer {
            border-top: 1px solid #b8b8b8;
            -webkit-box-flex: 0;
            -ms-flex-positive: 0;
            -webkit-flex-grow: 0;
            -moz-flex-grow: 0;
            flex-grow: 0;
            padding: 10px;
            text-align: center;
            width: 100%
        }

        .open>a {
            outline: 0
        }

        .btn {
            overflow: hidden;
            display: inline-block;
            margin-bottom: 0;
            font-weight: 400;
            text-align: center;
            vertical-align: middle;
            touch-action: manipulation;
            background-image: none;
            border: 1px solid transparent;
            white-space: nowrap;
            padding: 6px 12px;
            font-size: 14px;
            line-height: 1.6;
            border-radius: 6px;
            -webkit-touch-callout: none;
            -webkit-user-select: none;
            -moz-user-select: none;
            -ms-user-select: none;
            user-select: none
        }

        a {
            color: #56aac6;
            background-color: transparent
        }

        .open>.dropdown-menu {
            display: block
        }

        .dropdown-menu {
            position: absolute;
            top: 100%;
            left: 0;
            z-index: 1000;
            display: none;
            float: left;
            min-width: 160px;
            padding: 5px 0;
            margin: 2px 0 0;
            list-style: none;
            font-size: 14px;
            text-align: left;
            background-color: #fff;
            border: 1px solid #b8b8b8;
            border-radius: 6px;
            -webkit-box-shadow: 0 6px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, .175);
            box-shadow: 0 6px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, .175);
            background-clip: padding-box
        }

        .playback-container .multiple-participants-list .participant-item {
            display: -webkit-box;
            display: -moz-box;
            display: -ms-flexbox;
            display: -webkit-flex;
            display: flex;
            -ms-flex-align: center;
            -webkit-align-items: center;
            -moz-align-items: center;
            align-items: center;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #b8b8b8;
            padding: 10px;
            white-space: nowrap
        }

        .person-img.person-img-small {
            height: 40px;
            width: 40px
        }

        .playback-container .multiple-participants-list .participant-name {
            margin: 0 10px
        }

        .img-circle {
            border-radius: 50%
        }

        .carousel-inner>.item>a>img,
        .carousel-inner>.item>img,
        .img-responsive,
        .thumbnail a>img,
        .thumbnail>img {
            display: block;
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto
        }

        .person-img.person-img-small .person-icon {
            font-size: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            width: 40px
        }

        .person-img .missing-participant,
        .person-img .person-icon {
            display: inline-block;
            height: 90px;
            text-align: center;
            width: 90px;
            position: relative
        }

        .person-img .person-icon {
            -moz-border-radius: 50%;
            -webkit-border-radius: 50%;
            -ms-border-radius: 50%;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background-color: #195f7a;
            color: #f6f6f6;
            font-size: 75px;
            overflow: hidden
        }

        .person-img .missing-participant {
            color: #b8b8b8;
            font-size: 90px;
            line-height: 90px
        }

        [class*=" pc-icon-"]:before,
        [class^=pc-icon-]:before {
            font-family: purecloud-fonts !important;
            font-style: normal !important;
            font-weight: 400 !important;
            font-variant: normal !important;
            text-transform: none !important;
            line-height: 1;
            -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
            -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
            position: relative;
            top: 2px
        }

        .playback-container .playback-center {
            -webkit-box-flex: 1;
            -ms-flex-positive: 1;
            -webkit-flex-grow: 1;
            -moz-flex-grow: 1;
            flex-grow: 1;
            background-color: #fff;
            border-radius: 6px;
            border: 1px solid #b8b8b8;
            box-shadow: 0 0 5px #b8b8b8;
            padding: 5px;
            width: calc(-300%)
        }

        .playback-container .recording-views-container {
            flex-grow: 1;
            flex-shrink: 0
        }

        .chat-transcript-view {
            overflow-y: auto;
            overflow-x: hidden;
            display: -webkit-box;
            display: -moz-box;
            display: -ms-flexbox;
            display: -webkit-flex;
            display: flex;
            -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
            -box-orient: vertical;
            -webkit-flex-direction: column;
            -moz-flex-direction: column;
            -ms-flex-direction: column;
            flex-direction: column;
            -webkit-box-flex: 1;
            -ms-flex-positive: 1;
            -webkit-flex-grow: 1;
            -moz-flex-grow: 1;
            flex-grow: 1;
            -ms-flex-align: stretch;
            -webkit-align-items: stretch;
            -moz-align-items: stretch;
            align-items: stretch
        }

        .panel {
            margin-bottom: 22px;
            background-color: #fff;
            border: 1px solid transparent;
            border-radius: 6px;
            -webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, .05);
            box-shadow: 0 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, .05)
        }

        .panel .panel-heading {
            background: #fbfbfb;
            background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #f7f7f7 0, #e2e2e2 100%);
            border-top-right-radius: 8px;
            border-top-left-radius: 8px;
            border-top: 1px solid #b8b8b8;
            border-left: 1px solid #bbb;
            border-right: 1px solid #bbb;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #bbb;
            font-weight: 700
        }

        .panel-heading {
            padding: 10px 15px;
            border-bottom: 1px solid transparent;
            border-top-right-radius: 5px;
            border-top-left-radius: 5px
        }

        .chat-transcript-view .chat-log {
            overflow-y: auto;
            -ms-flex-positive: 1;
            -webkit-flex-grow: 1;
            -moz-flex-grow: 1;
            flex-grow: 1;
            -webkit-box-flex: 1;
            -ms-flex-negative: 1;
            -webkit-flex-shrink: 1;
            -moz-flex-shrink: 1;
            flex-shrink: 1;
            border: 1px solid #b8b8b8
        }

        .chat-transcript-view .chat-message-row {
            display: -webkit-box;
            display: -moz-box;
            display: -ms-flexbox;
            display: -webkit-flex;
            display: flex;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #b8b8b8
        }

        .chat-transcript-view .chat-cell.name {
            font-weight: 500;
            -ms-flex-positive: 1;
            -webkit-flex-grow: 1;
            -moz-flex-grow: 1;
            flex-grow: 1;
            -webkit-box-flex: 1;
            -ms-flex-negative: 1;
            -webkit-flex-shrink: 1;
            -moz-flex-shrink: 1;
            flex-shrink: 1;
            max-width: 150px;
            min-width: 150px;
            border-right: 1px solid #b8b8b8;
            text-align: right
        }

        .pull-right {
            float: right !important
        }

        .chat-transcript-view .chat-cell.message {
            -ms-flex-positive: 4;
            -webkit-flex-grow: 4;
            -moz-flex-grow: 4;
            flex-grow: 4;
            -webkit-box-flex: 4;
            -ms-flex-negative: 4;
            -webkit-flex-shrink: 4;
            -moz-flex-shrink: 4;
            flex-shrink: 4;
            word-break: break-word
        }

        .chat-transcript-view .chat-cell {
            padding: 5px 20px
        }

        .chat-transcript-view .chat-cell.time {
            color: #c5c5c5;
            -ms-flex-positive: 1;
            -webkit-flex-grow: 1;
            -moz-flex-grow: 1;
            flex-grow: 1;
            -webkit-box-flex: 1;
            -ms-flex-negative: 1;
            -webkit-flex-shrink: 1;
            -moz-flex-shrink: 1;
            flex-shrink: 1;
            max-width: 140px;
            min-width: 140px
        }

        .playback-container .details-tab-content {
            -ms-flex-positive: 1;
            -webkit-flex-grow: 1;
            -moz-flex-grow: 1;
            flex-grow: 1;
            -webkit-box-flex: 0;
            -ms-flex-negative: 0;
            -webkit-flex-shrink: 0;
            -moz-flex-shrink: 0;
            flex-shrink: 0;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;
            border-left: 1px solid #ddd;
            border-right: 1px solid #ddd;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column
        }

        .conversation-details-container .conversation-keywords-header,
        .conversation-details-container .conversation-metrics-header,
        .conversation-details-container .conversation-retention-header,
        .conversation-details-container .conversation-wrapup-header {
            border-bottom: 1px solid #b8b8b8
        }

        .conversation-details-container .details-row,
        .pc-form {
            display: -webkit-box;
            display: -moz-box;
            display: -ms-flexbox;
            display: -webkit-flex
        }

        .panel-body {
            padding: 15px
        }

        .conversation-details-container {
            width: 100%
        }

        .pc-form {
            display: flex;
            -box-orient: horizontal;
            -webkit-flex-direction: row;
            -moz-flex-direction: row;
            -ms-flex-direction: row;
            flex-direction: row;
            -webkit-flex-wrap: wrap;
            -moz-flex-wrap: wrap;
            -ms-flex-wrap: wrap;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            -webkit-justify-content: space-between;
            -moz-justify-content: space-between;
            justify-content: space-between;
            -ms-flex-pack: justify;
            max-width: 1000px
        }

        .conversation-details-container .details-row,
        .conversation-details-container .retention-details-header {
            -webkit-box-direction: normal;
            -box-direction: normal;
            direction: normal;
            -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
            -box-orient: horizontal;
            -webkit-flex-direction: row;
            flex-direction: row;
        }

        .conversation-details-container .details-row {
            display: flex;
            -moz-flex-direction: row;
            -ms-flex-direction: row;
            flex-direction: row;
            padding-top: 10px
        }

        .conversation-details-container .details-header {
            font-weight: 700;
            -webkit-flex: 1 0 50%;
            -moz-flex: 1 0 50%;
            -ms-flex: 1 0 50%;
            flex: 1 0 50%
        }

        .conversation-details-container .details-value {
            -webkit-flex: 1 0 50%;
            -moz-flex: 1 0 50%;
            -ms-flex: 1 0 50%;
            flex: 1 0 50%
        }

        .conversation-details-container .right-side {
            padding-left: 10px
        }

        .conversation-details-container .form-group {
            padding: 10px
        }

        .pc-form .form-group {
            width: calc(50% - 10px);
            vertical-align: top
        }

        .form-group {
            margin-bottom: 15px
        }

        .conversation-details-container .retention-details-header {
            display: -webkit-box;
            display: -moz-box;
            display: -ms-flexbox;
            display: -webkit-flex;
            display: flex;
            -moz-flex-direction: row;
            -ms-flex-direction: row;
            flex-direction: row
        }

        .conversation-details-container .details-subrow {
            display: -webkit-box;
            display: -moz-box;
            display: -ms-flexbox;
            display: -webkit-flex;
            display: flex;
            -webkit-box-direction: normal;
            -box-direction: normal;
            direction: normal;
            -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
            -box-orient: horizontal;
            -webkit-flex-direction: row;
            -moz-flex-direction: row;
            -ms-flex-direction: row;
            flex-direction: row;
            padding-top: 10px;
            padding-left: 30px
        }

        .conversation-details-container .details-row-2,
        .playback-container .empty-interaction-indicator {
            display: -webkit-box;
            display: -moz-box;
            display: -ms-flexbox;
            display: -webkit-flex;
            -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
            -box-orient: horizontal;
            -webkit-box-direction: normal;
            -box-direction: normal;
            direction: normal;
        }

        .pc-form .form-group.spanning {
            width: 100%;
            flex-basis: 100%
        }

        .conversation-details-container .details-external-participants,
        .conversation-details-container .details-internal-participants,
        .conversation-details-container .details-wrapup {
            padding-left: 0;
            list-style: none;
            margin: 0
        }

        .conversation-details-container .details-row-2 {
            display: flex;
            -webkit-flex-direction: row;
            -moz-flex-direction: row;
            -ms-flex-direction: row;
            flex-direction: row;
            padding-top: 10px
        }

        .conversation-details-container .details-header-2 {
            font-weight: 700;
            -webkit-flex: 1 0 15%;
            -moz-flex: 1 0 15%;
            -ms-flex: 1 0 15%;
            flex: 1 0 15%
        }

        .conversation-details-container .details-value-2 {
            -webkit-flex: 1 0 85%;
            -moz-flex: 1 0 85%;
            -ms-flex: 1 0 85%;
            flex: 1 0 85%
        }

        .playback-container .empty-interaction-indicator {
            display: flex;
            -webkit-flex-direction: row;
            -moz-flex-direction: row;
            -ms-flex-direction: row;
            flex-direction: row;
            -ms-flex-align: center;
            -webkit-align-items: center;
            -moz-align-items: center;
            align-items: center;
            background-color: #fff
        }

        .playback-container .empty-interaction-indicator .empty-interaction-icon {
            color: #b8b8b8;
            font-size: 30px;
            padding: 30px
        }

        .email-interactions-view {
            overflow-y: auto;
            overflow-x: hidden;
            display: -webkit-box;
            display: -moz-box;
            display: -ms-flexbox;
            display: -webkit-flex;
            display: flex;
            -webkit-box-direction: normal;
            -box-direction: normal;
            direction: normal;
            -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
            -box-orient: vertical;
            -webkit-flex-direction: column;
            -moz-flex-direction: column;
            -ms-flex-direction: column;
            flex-direction: column;
            -webkit-box-flex: 1;
            -ms-flex-positive: 1;
            -webkit-flex-grow: 1;
            -moz-flex-grow: 1;
            flex-grow: 1;
            -ms-flex-align: stretch;
            -webkit-align-items: stretch;
            -moz-align-items: stretch;
            align-items: stretch
        }

        .email-interactions-view .email-messages {
            overflow-y: auto;
            -ms-flex-positive: 1;
            -webkit-flex-grow: 1;
            -moz-flex-grow: 1;
            flex-grow: 1;
            -webkit-box-flex: 1;
            -ms-flex-negative: 1;
            -webkit-flex-shrink: 1;
            -moz-flex-shrink: 1;
            flex-shrink: 1
        }

        .email-interactions-view .email-message {
            padding: 5px;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #b8b8b8
        }

        .email-interactions-view .email-header-parent,
        .email-interactions-view .email-subject,
        .email-interactions-view .email-to {
            display: -webkit-box;
            display: -moz-box;
            display: -ms-flexbox;
            display: -webkit-flex;
            display: flex
        }

        .email-interactions-view .email-attachments {
            display: -webkit-box;
            display: -moz-box;
            display: -ms-flexbox;
            display: -webkit-flex;
            display: flex;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #f6f6f6
        }

        .email-interactions-view .email-time {
            margin-left: auto;
            color: #b8b8b8
        }

        .email-interactions-view .email-header-label,
        .email-interactions-view .email-subject-label,
        .email-interactions-view .email-to-label {
            margin-right: 10px;
            color: #b8b8b8
        }

        p {
            display: block;
            margin-block-start: 1em;
            margin-block-end: 1em;
            margin-inline-start: 0;
            margin-inline-end: 0;
            margin: 0 0 11px
        }
    </style>
    
</head>

<body onload="init()">
    <div id="loader" style="text-align: center;margin-top: 15%">
        <div class="lds-roller">
            <div></div>
            <div></div>
            <div></div>
            <div></div>
            <div></div>
            <div></div>
            <div></div>
            <div></div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div id="playback-container" style="display: none" class="playback-container">
        <div id="phonecall-container" class="phonecall-container">
            <div class="conversation-participant-container">
                <div class="participant-heading" data-bind="lString: labelKey">Internal Participant</div>
                <div id="participantBody" class="participant-body">
                    <div class="person-img">
                        <span id="iconInternalParticipant" class="person-icon">
                            <i class="profile icon" style="line-height: 1.5;"></i>
                        </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="participant-name">
                        <span id="internalParticipanName" data-bind="text: nameDisplayString"></span>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div id="footerInternalParticipant" style="display: none" class="participant-footer">
                    <div class="dropdown open" data-bind="dropdown: isOpen">
                        <a href="#" class="btn dropdown-toggle show-multiples">
                            <span data-bind="lString: 'playback.participants'">Participants</span>
                            <i class="fas fa-chevron-down" onclick="dropMenu()"></i>
                        </a>
                        <div id="dropMenu" style="display: none" class="multiple-participants-list dropdown-menu">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="playback-center" data-bind="css: { 'acdvoicemail': isVoicemailViewSelected }">
                <div class="recording-views-container" data-bind="foreach: recordingViews">
                    <div class="chat-details-container">
                        <div class="panel chat-transcript-view">
                            <div class="panel-heading" id="titleTranscript">Chat Log</div>
                            <div id="chatTranscriptContainer" style="display: none" class="chat-log">
                                <div class="chat-message-row">
                                    <div class="chat-cell name">
                                        <div class="pull-right">Guest</div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="chat-cell message">Hi</div>
                                    <div class="chat-cell time">
                                        <div class="pull-right">3:56 PM</div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <div id="messagingTranscriptContainer" style="display: none">
                                <div class="messages-details-container">
                                    <div class="messages-interactions-view">
                                        <div id="messaginPane" class="messages-scroll-pane">
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <div id="audioTranscriptContainer" style="display: none">
                                <div class="playback-data-waveform">
                                    <div id="progressAudio" class="playback-played-underlay" style="width: 0px"></div>
                                    <canvas style="position: absolute;z-index: 2;" width="639" height="100"></canvas>
                                </div>
                                <audio id="audioPlayer" type='audio/mp3'
                                    style="display: none;margin-left: auto;margin-right: auto;margin-top:5%;"
                                    controls="controls"></audio>
                            </div>
                            <div id="emailTranscriptContainer">
                                <div class="email-details-container" style="display: none;">
                                    <div class="email-interactions-view">
                                        <div class="email-messages">
                                            <div class="email-message">
                                                <div class="email-header-parent">
                                                    <span class="email-header-label">From</span>
                                                    <div class="email-header">alessandro.iuliano@softphone.it</div>
                                                    <div class="email-time" data-bind="lDate: time">Wednesday, December
                                                        5, 2018 11:26 AM</div>
                                                </div>

                                                <div class="email-body slide-panel" style="display: block;">
                                                    <div class="email-to">
                                                        <span class="email-to-label">To</span>
                                                        <div>
                                                            <span
                                                                data-bind="text: email">connector@genesys.mypurecloud.com</span>
                                                        </div>
                                                    </div>
                                                    <div class="email-subject">
                                                        <span class="email-subject-label">Subject</span>
                                                        <div>Test Mail PureCloud</div>
                                                    </div>
                                                    <div class="email-attachments">
                                                    </div>
                                                    <p>
                                                        <div>
                                                            <p><span style="font-size:11pt">Test email PureCloud
                                                                    Connector</span><span
                                                                    style="font-size:11pt;color:black"></span></p>
                                                        </div>
                                                        This e-mail message including any attachments is confidential
                                                        and may be covered by legal professional secret. The
                                                        information transmitted is for the sole use of the intended
                                                        recipient(s) and any unauthorized review, use, disclosure or
                                                        distribution is prohibited.
                                                        If you are not the intended recipient, please immediately
                                                        contact the sender by reply e-mail and delete the original
                                                        message and destroy all copies thereof. Any communication
                                                        between you and a member of Softphone is not to be considered
                                                        of personal nature
                                                        between you and the member: Softphone may review
                                                        correspondence. Softphone and the sender accept no liability
                                                        for any loss, disruption or damage to your data or computer
                                                        system that may occur while using data contained in, or
                                                        transmitted with, this email.
                                                        Views or opinions expressed in this message may be those of the
                                                        author and may not necessarily represent those of Softphone.

                                                    </p>
                                                </div>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="conversation-participant-container">
                <div class="participant-heading" data-bind="lString: labelKey">External Participant</div>
                <div class="participant-body">
                    <div class="person-img">
                        <span class="person-icon">
                            <i class="profile icon" style="line-height: 1.5;"></i>
                        </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="participant-name">
                        <span id="externalParticipanName"></span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="panel-body details-tab-content">
            <div class="conversation-details-container pc-form">
                <div class="form-group">
                    <h4 class="conversation-metrics-header">Interaction Metrics</h4>
                    <div class="details-row">
                        <span class="details-header">Interaction Type</span>
                        <span class="details-value">
                            <span class="details-email-type" id="interactionType"></span>
                        </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="details-row">
                        <span class="details-header">Start Time</span>
                        <span class="details-value details-start-time" id="startTimeValue"></span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="details-row">
                        <span class="details-header">End Time</span>
                        <span class="details-value details-end-time" id="endTimeValue"></span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="details-row">
                        <span class="details-header">Duration</span>
                        <span class="details-value details-duration" id="durationTimeValue"></span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="conversation-details-container pc-form">
                <div class="form-group">
                    <h4 class="conversation-metrics-header">Wrap-up Information</h4>
                    <div class="details-row">
                        <span class="details-header">Name</span>
                        <span class="details-value">
                            <span class="details-email-type" id="wrapUpName"></span>
                        </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="details-row">
                        <span class="details-header">Code</span>
                        <span class="details-value details-start-time" id="wrapUpCode"></span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="details-row">
                        <span class="details-header">Notes</span>
                        <span class="details-value details-start-time" id="wrapUpNotes"></span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

</body>

</html>
</j:jelly>
sys_ui_page.name: ixnmgrview
